item.title: How to Read Data using Python?
item.description: Read From Text File Suppose we have an example data file symbol,date,time,high,low appl,20000101,15:00,100.1,90.5 appl,20000102,15:00,100.1,90.5 intc,20000101,15:00,30.1,28.5 Use Python Built-in I/O If the csv data file is clean and ready to be used (pure numeric, no delimiter messing up, no quote problem), we can use the simple Python I/O interface to read it. Method One: Loop the data file line by line. This method is more efficient and recommended. “line” is a string.
